This Terms of Use is intended to apply only to the Website. If you access other Guardant Health websites, you will be subject to the Terms of Use posted as applicable to those websites.

Your use of the Website constitutes your acceptance of these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to all of these terms and conditions, do not use the Website.

We may modify these terms and conditions, in whole or in part, at any time and in its sole discretion. Such modifications will be effective when posted on this Website. Your continued use of the Website constitutes acceptance of these terms and conditions as modified. Certain features and services may be subject to additional requirements, rules, and policies, which are incorporated by reference into these terms and conditions.

We may terminate, change, or otherwise modify any aspect of the Website, or impose limits on features or restrict access, in whole or in part, to the Website at any time and in its sole discretion without liability. We may terminate any authorizations, rights, and licenses provided herein.

The above authorization does not include the design of the Website or layout of the Website, elements of which are legally protected and may not be copied or imitated in whole or in part. No logo, graphic, sound, or image from this Website may be copied or retransmitted unless expressly authorized by Guardant Health. No other use of the materials is authorized. The materials at this Website are proprietary and any unauthorized use of any materials at this Website may violate copyright, trademark, and other laws. Guardant Health respects the intellectual property rights of third parties and requests users of the Services to notify Guardant Health at legal@guardanthealth.com if they become aware that any content on this Website may violate or infringe upon the intellectual property rights of any third party.

You shall not misrepresent your identity when using the Website and you shall not send or transmit to or through this website any unlawful, defamatory, threatening, or otherwise objectionable material. You shall not use this Website to attempt to access or disclose personally identifiable information or collect information

Links to this Website

Any links to Guardant Health Websites: (i) must display that page full-screen in a fully operable and navigable browser window and not within a “frame”; (ii) may not present false information about Guardant Health products, services, or technology, nor by the appearance, position, and other aspects of the link create a false appearance that another entity, its activities, or products are associated with, sponsored, or endorsed by Guardant Health; and (iii) may not use or display the Guardant Health logo without permission.

No Medical or Professional Services Advice

Nothing contained on the public areas of the Website is intended to constitute medical advice, instruction for medical diagnosis, guidance for treatment or legal, technical or financial advice. Information provided on the public areas of the Website should not be considered complete, nor should it be relied on to suggest a course of treatment for a particular individual.
